attributes.action: Scrap the TV Licence fee for the Disabled: Mentally and Physically
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Disabled people have other utilities to worry about and cannot afford another "milking".

Television has seen many changes since the Televison Licence was created and these days with pay TV companies such as Sky TV, if you wish to subscribe to a channel, you pay. People now have a choice of channels! So, please scrap the the TV Licence fee as it is no longer required. Thank you!
